sub_title: Customer Journey Expert COPAF Instant Payments at ING
summary:
I am an experienced Payments and Implementations Teamlead on the subjects of Global ePayments Processing, Project Management and technical Implementations within IT, Banking and the Alternative Payments industries.

I have built my experience at renowned Fintech institutions such as PAY.ON, ABN AMRO, Ingenico, Royal Bank of Scotland, ACI Worldwide, ING, Cognizant & Nationale Nederlanden.

Most recently I was employed as Teamlead Payments & Fraud with Cognizant & NN. My responsibilities centered around the set-up and implementation of the Cognizant Payments As A Service (PAAS) & Business Process Outsourcing propositions for Nationale Nederlanden Bank.

Besides the role of Teamlead, I have fulfilled the Senior Implementations and Project Manager roles to guide end-to-end Fintech / Banking & e-commerce integrations, from pre- sales consulting to 2nd Line technical support.

My professional background has allowed me to develop essential "soft skills" in customer facing functions, and I enjoy interfacing with clients. I am most comfortable operating on the intersection of Business and IT, and can effectively balance the requirements between the two.

My strengths are my inquisitive nature, and being a quick study on new assignments.
This allows me to get to the bottom of the subject matter swiftly, and be adaptable in a dynamic environment.

Additionally, I am very involved with the social aspects of my team, and due to my positive personality, I strive to be helpful and a trusted advisor in all my capacities.


Besides the role of Project Manager and Lead, I have fulfilled the Senior Implementations and Business Consultant roles to guide end-to-end fintech e-commerce integrations, from pre- sales consulting to 2nd Line technical support.

My professional background has allowed me to develop essential "soft skills" in customer facing functions, and I enjoy interfacing with clients. I am most comfortable operating on the intersection of Business and IT, and can effectively balance the requirements between the two.

My strengths are my inquisitive nature, and being a quick study on new assignments.
This allows me to get to the bottom of the subject matter swiftly, and be adaptable in a dynamic environment.

Additionally, I am very involved with the social aspects of my teams, and due to my positive personality, I strive to be helpful and a trusted advisor in all my capacities.

profile_positions.title: Customer Journey Expert COPAF Instant Payments

profile_positions.description:
Responsible as Teamlead / Deputy Manager of the Cognizant BPO PAAS project team with Nationale Nederlanden, in order to execute the daily “Run the Bank” activities:

*Payments Reconciliation: identifying and solving mismatched items on Internal Wash / Suspense Accounts for different payment streams (Target2 Nostro account etc.)

*Ensuring daily Internal Supense / Wash Accounts Statements and Ledgers are reconciled to ensure a 100% accurate bookkeeping in the NN Bank accounting.

*Management Reporting: preparing Management Information towards Cognizant PAAS + NN Bank stakeholders for all BAU Reconciliation Activities by the BPO team. These consist of several BPO daily reports to ensure a 100% audit & accounting accuracy on the daily payment flows of NN bank.

*Knowledge Owner on Temenos T24 Payment processing flows, Payment messaging & reporting files. These concern SEPA / SWIFT payments & reporting messages. (MT / CAMT / PACS / PAIN files)

*Transaction troubleshooting: monitoring & troubleshooting “error” payment messages to ensure these payments are processed correctly or canceled.

*KYC Transaction Monitoring: monitoring flagged payments and maintain contact with NN KYC teams as an outsourced 2nd line for FCM module interaction within Temenos T24.

*Payments Reporting: monitoring and ensuring the 100% accurate receipt & sending of Statement messages with DNB & equensWorldline in Temenos T24.

*Process design and Implementation for PAAS BPO team in conjunction with Cognizant + NN Bank Product Owners + Business stakeholders.

*BPO PAAS Product Owner for SEPA Instant & iDeal Payments, and tasked with the Implementation based on the NN Business Requirements & Temenos T24 setup.

*Organizing & execution of technical workshops with NN + Cognizant Product Owners for process design and implementation of BPO workflows + technical execution.

*Composition of Standard Operating Procedures, Work Instructions, KPI’s and role creation for the BPO team and core tasks.
profile_positions.title: Teamlead Fraud & Payments

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for KYC Project Coordination and successful clearing of KYC Commercial Banking Client Investigations files:

*Certified ABN DFC KYC Analyst, completing KYC CDD Client Investigations successfully.

*TCS Onshore custodian for ABN Client Outreach call quality: Achieved quality increase from 35% to 95% accuracy by Offshore Analysts.

*Project Manager for Offshore KYC Project on tactical items, focusing on the Implementation of Quality improvement, KYC Rulebook Updates and Cross Department alignment.

*Knowledge Owner on Transaction Monitoring within the KYC review, designing / providing specific training materials to +600 FTE TCS Offshore staff.

*Trainer for +600 FTE Offshore staff on KYC review Quality, and how to approach solving ABN KYC Investigations as a KYC specialist.

*Quality review to Independent Quality Checkers: performing 2nd opinion to QR rejects, and successful in identifying alignment issues and quality concerns. Clearing these issues had an average 15% improvement in "First Time Right" investigations.

*Creating + Presenting management reports to ABN Amro DFC KYC senior management.

*Liaison + Contact person in a bridge function between ABN DFC KYC departments and TCS Offshore KYC structure. Bridging Cultural \ Language \ Company \ Alignment gaps between both ABN and TCS organizations.

*Team leader for the unit Business Retail, acting in daily coordination of 6 Senior KYC Analysts in the TCS Onshore team.
 
*Implemented the new Retail KYC Pilot structure successfully with Onshore team, ensuring Quality Control and "Low Friction" acceptance of completed files with Quality Checkers.

*Participating in Review / Release of the ABN Amro KYC Analyst Work Instructions with ABN Amro Compliance team.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator / Compliance Advisor ABN Amro TCS KYC Offshore

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for: 

*Ensuring the accuracy of global Guest payments (required approvals, documentation, notes, procedures and guidelines)
*Processing payments to Booking.com system “Wallet” or via international bank transactions 
*Tracking & trending payment issues and developments.

*Leading projects into:

- Deep Dive into Goodwill Gesture procedural misuse for Guest payouts.

- Improvement of 1st line CS Agents incorrect escalations towards 2nd Line teams (PSG and Payops teams).

- Training PSG teams in Transaction Banking and PSP integrations with Stripe, Adyen and Ingenico in regards to the “Booking Wallet” and card tokenization.
profile_positions.title: Global Payments Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible as Line Manager of the Franx Client Service team of 6 FTE, and the daily Operations of the Service team handling of FX Trades and (Cross Border) Payments queries, as well as various internal tasks to scale up the business.

*Additionally responsible for Interdepartmental relations, Supplier management at ABN Amro and external parties.
*Handling of client Onboarding and KYC acceptance requests.
*Investigation into failed / returned international SWIFT payments.
*Composing Client Risk Assessment Reports.
*Custodian of Work Instructions documents maintenance of Services team.
*Review of Client Activity as part of the Account management process.
*Performing client checks with ABN Amro tools RDC / OCC / VISA / EVA for the KYC / Risk process.
*Handling of input of client data into the Franx CRM System Matrix Online.
*Performing of  Periodic Client Reviews with Risk Assessment.
*Project management in the project Go Franx! for migration of ABN AMRO clients data interaction with Franx and set up of dedicated migration team.
*Services Liaison in the development of FX Forwards product line with IT.
*Lead project manager on Digital KYC and Onboarding of new clients onto the Franx CRM system Matrix.
*Set up of Operational Management meetings with IT to discuss technical Operational matters and Client Feedback on the Franx technical issues / developments.
*Translating platform errors into tangible Roadmap / Backlog items for IT in Agile Scrum way of working.
*Co – Managing IT Roadmap and Backlog items pertaining to Services product requirements.
*Achieved DSI – ESMA certification for FX / MiFid2 Regulation to service FX Forward Trades for clients on the Franx platform.
*Custodian of Franx internal SLA’s, and SLA’s of partner departments at ABN Amro, and suppliers to the Services team. In addition successfully negotiated better Service terms at ABN Amro partner departments.
profile_positions.title: Lead Services

profile_positions.description:
Business Analyst Payments - Customer Journey Expert at ING

Participated as Business Analist Payments in the internal role of Customer Journey Expert (Product Owner) under the Unite project. Unite project entails the end to end merging of the entire Banking operations of ING Netherlands and ING Belgium entities.

*Preparation and composition of central Business Migration Plan for the Business Management Office and Payments Area Lead.
*Successful track record of closing top to bottom product gaps and harmonize ING Belgium products and services to the Netherlands Target Value Proposition.
*Prepared and designed Gap lists management and cross department review to complement ING IT backlog.
*SPOC for Cross department contacts with Documents Services, Pricing & Billing and Assisted Channels.
*Liaison for IT department for the International Payments and (Electronic) Reporting topics
*Successfully completed tasks to prepare for Wave 1 of the migration actions.
* Unite migration team Agile Product Owner: entails custody of Sharepoint documents, ServiceNow Epics management and management reporting.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner Payments - Customer Journey Expert

profile_positions.description:
In charge of managing E-commerce technical gateway implementation projects for PSP's. I-PSP's and large merchant clients.


*Business (Model) Analysis in regards to Payments solutions for (financial) institutions in E-commerce. 
*High Level Project Management and Technical Liaison
*2nd Line Technical Support on API’s and technical gateway processing of multiple E-commerce platforms.
*Account Management for large E-commerce entities, including Sales operational tasks, commercial planning / forecasting. 
*Knowledge owner of the ACI - PAY.ON payments gateway, and Product Owner for Payments solutions including Risk management.
*Teamlead for various PSP projects for the outsourced Service teams placed in Bulgaria, Germany and Philippines. (11 FTE in total)
*Project leader for client KYC monitoring and Merchant Onboarding improvements.
*Technical Payments Consulting; building payments infrastructures to allow for E-commerce activity at non financial entities.
*Solution Architect on best practices in Payments / Fraud & Risk management, and developing payments business processes for (non) financial institutions.
*Senior technical project leader of new implementation projects.
*Guiding partner Integration Projects with Cardinal Commerce, Skrill, and LindeGas GmbH.
*Product Owner on partner software development projects for customized 3rd party Magento and WooCommerce Plugins.
*Sales and Project presentations for prospects to the PAY.ON gateway
*Implementations Project Manager on technical and service framework for future (I) – PSP’s
*Product Owner on PSD 2.0 regulations, including XS2A framework, SEPA Instant Payments, Data Security and all future PSP variations in EBA Rulebook.
profile_positions.title: Senior Implementations & Accounts Manager

profile_positions.description:
*Advising an e-commerce start up in ladies fashion on payment products, and optimal conversion. Also advising on marketing strategy and forming a business plan for a physical store in the future.

*Advising on SEPA and ePayments functionality on a newly devised e-commerce concept at an exciting new PSP start up.
profile_positions.title: ePayments Consultant

profile_positions.description:
*Promoted to the position of Senior SEPA Implementation Consultant on interim basis, after consistent quality advisory to the Implementation Management and Sales teams.
*Assisting IM’s in XML testing and direct further technical guidance to large corporate entities in different industries.
*Maintaining the cross regional departmental relationship between the SEPA Migration team and the (SEPA) IM departments.
*Taking over migration projects, and guide them effectively as acting\temporary Senior SEPA Implementation Manager, with full responsibilities of the role.
*Managing of client information by employing SQL databases.
* Pre-sales consulting for RFP’s and deals in relation to SEPA functionality in cooperation with Sales and Account Management.
*Partaking in, and advising within the IM team meetings and SEPA “Huddle” meetings according Six Sigma Lean Methodology.
*Acting as senior technical implementation manager in calls organized by Sales \ Relationship Management, to re-assure clients and to trouble shoot SEPA issues on a strategic level.
*Business Analysis and requirements formulation in regards to SEPA migration and XML development.
*Implementation and maintenance of different cash management solutions as in Cash Pooling, and FX products for large corporates.
profile_positions.title: Senior SEPA Implementation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
*Project Manager of the successfully completed Mass Migration of RBS Access Online users employing Direct Entry \ Manual payments work stream. (2800 clients migrated)
*Project Manager of the successful migration of Multicash Exit Slovakia users to RBS Access Online Global platform
*Senior Consultant knowledge owner of SEPA SCT and SDD end to end processing.
*Knowledge owner on SEPA payments in general, highlighting the new RBS payment engines for SEPA, namely RPE & RPF.
*Signaling issues with technical applications such as RBS XML Validator.
*Knowledge owner of the RBS Access Online and Access Direct TIG (Technical Implementation Guides) for these channels.
*Advanced SEPA Credit Transfer and SEPA Direct Debit XML testing, and RBS native systems checks and configurations.
Knowledge owner of the RBS Access Online and Access Direct TIG (Technical Implementation Guides) for these channels.
*Guiding the Isabel Belgium SEPA Migration project.
*Advanced SEPA Credit Transfer and SEPA Direct Debit XML testing, and RBS native systems checks and configurations.
*Special Implementation Manager liaison for multiple regions; US, EMEA, NL, conducting conference calls and maintaining their information supply from the general SEPA project team. Assisting and consulting on the ongoing IM Migrations from these regions.
*Guiding clients to full migration; starting from contracting, operational support, technical guidance, XML testing, end to end “penny testing”, reporting guidance and more. End to end migration and on boarding to Access Online Global.
*Providing support as a SEPA Specialist to the general US/NL/EMEA Implementation Managers on all areas regarding SEPA (contracting/technical/procedural/operational – processing & reporting)
*Providing guidance in the setup and configuration of Access Online domains to allow for Payment Uploads and correct user configuration.
*Business Analysis and requirements formulation as a component for migration projects to SEPA compliancy.
profile_positions.title: Senior Payments Consultant / SEPA Migration Specialist
